name: Escape from the Bunker
description:
Escape from the Bunker is a little paced FPS. You are in the middle of nowhere, trying to escape from this place, by fighting against many cute enemies. Find into these randomized bunkers the exit - the blue light. You will find weapons and bonuses which are hidden in the boxes along the labyrinth. Don't forget that the time plays against you. Your main weapon is able to attract skulls and throw it so as to do some damage on your enemies. The golden skull is the best way so as to kill them. See the map so as to find the exit...

The web player version is cool, by you could enjoy this game, by downloading the executable. Also you can buy the full code source for Unity 5.2 or higher. Thank you for playing. Bye ++

Music has been created by NightDriver.
Available for free on site NoSoapRadio.
